mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_UID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, USER_UID, BOARD_HIT, BOARD_TIME FROM BOARD WHERE TYPE_UID = #{boardType} ORDER BY BOARD_UID DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{lastPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( TYPE_UID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, USER_UID, BOARD_HIT, BOARD_TIME ) VALUES ( #{boardType}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{userId}, 0, SYSDATE() )
